title: "Flagship Pioneering’s Senda Bio secures $123M for new ‘programmable medicines’"
excerpt: "Biotech startup Senda Biosciences is developing technology that yields a new type of medicine with two programming components: one directs the therapy to go to a particular destination in the body while the second tells the therapy what to do once it gets there."
